statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number, purchase_history FROM customer_data WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, income FROM customer_data WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 and gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE income >= 50000 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, income FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000.00;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, category FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.total_amount > products.price;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM Transactions t JOIN Products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.product_name, t.quantity FROM Transactions t JOIN Products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.quantity > 5 ORDER BY t.quantity DESC, p.product_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount, payment_status FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, discount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date, is_active FROM customers WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, payment_status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
